item.title: Instructions
item.description: Instructions Build a Resume or About Me page Give your page a <title> tag inside of your Head element Use at least 10 elements in your Body Suggested Elements <h1> What is the biggest header on your page <h2> Subheadings <p> Tell us about yourself <ul> or List your experiences <img> if you want! Style these elements using CSS classes and IDâ€™s
